'' : 'none' } useEffect(() => { axios .get('https://restcountries.com/v3.1/all') .then(response => { setCountries(response.data) }) }, []) console.log(countries) const filteredCountries = query.trim() ? countries.filter(country => country.name.common.toLowerCase() .includes(query.trim().toLowerCase())) : [] const addDetails = () => { filteredCountries.map((country, countryIndex) =>
